Tournament JSON-RPC

АПИ реализована в формате JSON-RPC. Спецификация описана тут.

/authentication

Аутентификация пользователя Готово

/authentication/getTokenByPassword post

post

Получение токена по логину и паролю Готово

post /authentication/getTokenByPassword

Получение токена по логину и паролю Готово

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "...",
  "params": {
    "body": {
      "login": "admin",
      "password": "123456"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "body": {
      "authorization_token": "jwt eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjAwMDRiY2ZmLWQ4YWMtNDliZi1lZDVmLTY4ZGI0NjM3NTgyNCJ9.eyJzdWJqZWN0Ijp7ImlkIjo1NTV9LCJhdWQiOltdLCJleHAiOjIyMzY5MTg1MDh9.WY92mr4Ejf8B0TcrFxsbKklBhvoHyC-F-JQxzI1sBvI",
      "refresh_token": "Vi050WzmB2y9gdE5Wd8egdFODPlJZrP8RQD77sbCQhtpDnFpDncmmOMYPWa1yKfI"
    }
  }
}

/userRegistration

Регистрация

/userRegistration/requestActivationCode post

post

Запросить код активации

post /userRegistration/requestActivationCode

Запросить код активации

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "userRegistration.requestActivationCode",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru",
      "timestamp": "2021-05-26T15:59:16+0000"
    },
    "body": {
      "email": "admin@ex.com"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": null
}

Secured by userAuth

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "error": {
    "code": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  },
  "id": null
}

/userRegistration/createAccount post

post

Создать аккаунт

post /userRegistration/createAccount

Создать аккаунт

Secured by userAuth

Отправляем токен пользователя в теле POST-запроса, в параметре "params.meta.Authorization"

  • Request
  • Response
  • Security

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "userRegistration.createAccount",
  "params": {
    "meta": {
      "version": 1,
      "Language":"ru"
    },
    "body": {
      "email": "admin@ex.com",
      "code": "465956",
      "password": "Wwqq1$",
      "passwordConfirm": "Wwqq1$"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": null
}

Secured by userAuth

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "error": {
    "code": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  },
  "id": null
}

/restorePassword

Восстановление пароля Готово

/restorePassword/requestActivationCode post

post

Запрос кода активации

post /restorePassword/requestActivationCode

Запрос кода активации

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "...",
  "params": {
    "body": {
      "email": "user123@example.com"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": null
}

/restorePassword/createPassword post

post

Создание пароля

post /restorePassword/createPassword

Создание пароля

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "...",
  "params": {
    "body": {
      "email": "user123@example.com",
      "activation_code": "123456",
      "password": "qwerty123",
      "password_confirm": "qwerty123"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Media type: application/json

Type: any

Example:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": null
}
